projects.title: AI-Powered Code Reviewer
projects.description: An intelligent code-review automation tool built using Node.js, React.js, and MongoDB, integrated with Gemini AI. Designed to help developers review pull requests faster with AI-generated insights.

projects.title: Twitter Clone
projects.description: A clean and responsive Twitter-style UI clone built using only HTML and CSS. Designed to replicate the look and feel of Twitterâ€™s interface with modern styling, smooth layout, and pixel-perfect component design.

projects.title: Resume Builder
projects.description: A modern and intuitive Resume Builder that allows users to create professional resumes instantly. Features include customizable templates, live preview, easy form inputs, PDF download support, and a clean UI designed for job seekers to build resumes effortlessly.
